markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Onyx Trader](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=67)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 46 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Eye of Dread

</column>

Oprak doesn’t share the secrets of the Onyx Vault with many, but you are one of the lucky few to be permitted into the heart of the nation. You have traveled the extradimensional paths of the Stone Roads and traded goods across a wide variety of lands. You’ve learned to step lively in foreign markets of all types.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Dexterity
or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) skill, and the [Mercantile Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Multilingual](/Feats.aspx?ID=814) skill feat.
name: Onyx Trader

text: Onyx Trader Source World Guide pg. 46 2.0 Region Eye of Dread Oprak doesn’t share the secrets of the Onyx Vault with many, but you are one of the lucky few to be permitted into the heart of the nation. You have traveled the extradimensional paths of the Stone Roads and traded goods across a wide variety of lands. You’ve learned to step lively in foreign markets of all types. Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Dexterity or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost. You're trained in the Society skill, and the Mercantile Lore skill. You gain the Multilingual skill feat.
